targets.query: SELECT last("time.up") AS "uptime" FROM "node" WHERE ("nodeid" =~ /$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("time.up") AS "uptime" FROM "node" WHERE ("nodeid" =~ /$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Percent of missing statistics responses. Lots of missing responses may indicate some kind of overload or bottleneck between this node and the statistics ("respondd") server.

targets.query:
SELECT sum("missing_response")/(sum("missing_response")+sum("received_response"))*100 as "Missing Statistics Data" FROM
(SELECT 1-count("clients.total") AS "missing_response", count("clients.total") AS "received_response" FROM "node" WHERE ("nodeid" =~ /$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[saveinterval]]s) fill(0))
GROUP BY time($__interval*10) fill(null)

panels.title: Missing Statistics Responses

targets.query: SELECT sum("clients.total") *$time_save/$time_group AS "Clients", count("load") *$time_save/$time_group AS "Node" FROM "node" WHERE "nodeid" =~ /$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[time_group]]s) fill(null)

SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("down") * 8 AS "down",   NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("up") * 8 AS "up", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("mgmt_down") * 8 AS "mgmt_down",  NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("mgmt_up") * 8 AS "mgmt_up", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("forward") * 8 AS "forward" FROM (SELECT LAST("traffic.rx.bytes") AS "down", LAST("traffic.tx.bytes") as "up", LAST("traffic.mgmt_rx.bytes") AS "mgmt_down", LAST("traffic.mgmt_tx.bytes") AS "mgmt_up", LAST("traffic.forward.bytes") AS "forward" FROM "node" WHERE ("nodeid" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none))
SELECT mean("neighbours.total") AS "Total", mean("neighbours.vpn") AS "VPN" FROM "node" WHERE "nodeid" =~ /$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("load") AS "Load", (1-(mean(memory.free)+mean(memory.buffers)+mean(memory.cached))/mean(memory.total) ) AS "Mem" FROM "node" WHERE ("nodeid" =~ /$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("airtime11g.chan_util") *$time_save/$time_group AS "2.4 Ghz", mean("airtime11a.chan_util") *$time_save/$time_group AS "5 Ghz" FROM "node" WHERE "nodeid" =~ /$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[time_group]]s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("clients.total") AS "Clients", mean("clients.wifi") AS "Wifi", mean("clients.wifi5") AS "5Ghz", count("load") AS "Node" FROM "node" WHERE "nodeid" =~ /$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "nodeid"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "nodeid" WHERE "hostname" = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "hostname"
